post.body: if syrah goes with brake pads then it must go with traffic as well. or maybe a smoky carmenere?
I'm in the trade in Columbia-- will you be out and about Thurs night? i have a tasting that ends at 8.
omg todays only tuesday. that sucks. i want the weekend NOW!
i hate when those wine stealing fairies come around and empty all my bottles! sheesh!
im scared! im a huge boston fan!
okey dokey! guess that means I need to open the package up! LOL
LOL sorry if I missed that commentary!
i still like #67. um, #36 looks like he has a corkscrew stuck in his brain. LOL
yes sir! I follow you well.... you can always email me at dani@grassrootswine.com
good you can do mine now! Ive been too busy baking 10 dozen cookies tonight- wanna trade?
BUT in general I like the wine. is amazing how food and wine can be great-or not sogreat. a newworld juicy grenache woulda been btr
I ate the coconut shreds that fell off the cookies-so 3? the grenache is dry/french- a little too dusty for sweet coconut cappucino
wine is the cause of, and the solution to all of life's problems. it will make your lips better
I am a leftie too. i have permanent ink slime on my left hand.
mine are all in bags in the garage, unwrapped, unmailed. just sittin there with my unwritten xmas cards. o well
merci! j'aimerais bien faire partie
he makes many. could be Old River Road Cab, Ukiah Cab, Mendocino Farms Redvine, Talmadge Charbono or syrah- i have no idea!
ou trouve-je cette groupe- Vendredis du Vin? a twitter ou autreparts? (desolee chepa comment mettre les accents a l'ordinateur)
I think I place the most new wines between 1030 am and 1230. and then after 5 pm, when the spitting is less and ppl relaxed.
me! me! me! yay for #ttl I wonder how many ppl are tasting?
yes, I am hydrating and resting as we speak. trying not to let the stress of today get to me so I can recover and get to work!
The eighth in a series of Winos to Follow : http://drinksareonme.net/?p=596 thanks for the love!
ouch. that's not cold thats freezing brrr yucky cold
I love morphine. like really really. like seen them play lots in boston *sigh*
yeah I could! where's my invite? :)
aaah I missed the $10 CA cabs plonkiness---and I totally agree! gimme a CDR any day or a languedocian something!
I know we all pay for it somehow.... :) I didnt mean to give you a hard time! its been a rough day here
I dunno she is talking about it! i emailed her Could be fun! Do u have plans?
hey Id be thankful for any steak dinner! my b-i-l's company laid off 22 people today!
that is a good thought! I need to keep that one handy!
ive heard thats a great game!
this is true. im spoiled by only estate juice in my portfolio though. but you make a good point. my cheapest gigondas is $30
me too!
there are cheap gigondas?
I thought that they had a drought in 07-08 and production went way down?
dh and I both lol'ed at that one
the vinturi is fun, just dont use it on cheap/overextracted wine! Old world wines benefit well
you hit spellcheck! ')
thanks! I have had a great month so far- the hard work all year seems to be paying off!
i heard their in store after xmas sale is supposed to be awesome, lost of $1 and $2 books... do you live near one?
Strub "Soil to Soul" is wonderful as well. I have met the family - they are so great!
my dad yesterday was like Oh no why is Bojangles closed i need a sausage biscuit greasebomb for this hangover! LOL
that was me on Xmas eve, we partied like rockstars and paid for it in the AM
cannonau= grenache clone, from Sardinia :)
I dont think velvet glove was ever $299.99 but that price seems lower than I've seen
god I remember when I liked ravenswood. it was about 8 years ago. those were the days!
whereabouts? I grew up outside of hartford
yeah the slow pour thingies with the little holes (plastic snap in piece) make a bubbly mess. I found out the hard way.
home from a long day @ work. love arcadian fiddlestix vineyard pinot! great bottle 2 take out 2day
Tryin to figure out how to get trade tickets to the World Beer Festival in Columbia 1/24/09- anyone been to one in NC or VA?
I just joined the wine Twitter Group http://tgr.me/g/wine and you can too. Please Retweet.
good morning! i need to mainline some coffee!
off to bed. I got my employee purchase in hirsch g-v, thos.henry chard, luigi bosca pinot, lucasnlewellen cab, chono syrah elqui. mmmmm
oh my stupid wine drama today. if you both pay the same price for the same bottle and charge a different retail, HOW IS IT MY FAULT???!!!
having a croque monsieur at an account!
crap so I want to show this wine today and its got an 83 point rating and its $20 retail. think im gonna save that one 4 another day.
i feel sick and overtired
orders in, time for jammies and a little diablo2 on battlenet and my brake-friendly Syrah. nothin like startin to relax at midnight *sigh*
Checking out Mr. Tweet, a personal assistant for discovering the great followers and influencers in my network: http://mrtweet.net?c=8!
ive made 105 of the 120 cookies necessary. im losing my desire to keep going..... almost there! gonna keep hittin that grenache
just popped open a bottle of In Fine grenache/syrah in honor of scraping dozens of cookies off the baking sheets
haha these cookies are great but soooo hard to scrape off the sheet. why oh y did I skip the parchment paper!!! need.a.drink!
the cookies f*in rock. I am still however, drinkless. unless you count ice water, which I do not. unless hungover.
I am about to bake 10 dozen cappucino coconut cookies. trying to decide what to drink
whoo hoo! won a free 3 liter of wine from Steve Ryan- org/bio winemaker and awesome guy- from magnanimous wine group. yaaayyyyy!
slept crappy, have a migrane coming on, how am I going to get everything done today?!?!
going to doze off now . big day tomorrow, i usually dont go in the mkt on fridays but tomorrows an exception!
I need to place my xmas wine order. any varietal ideas? we're having ham, mashed potatos nothing crazy
I am home from work. I showed some wines today that I think were released too early. I'd prefer not to bottle age them in the warehouse! lol
I am cranky today! I need an attitude adjustment, stat! but I am gonna get a haircut later today, that should help.
buenos dias
im off to bed. should have gone to bed 2 hours ago
im like crying to every minute of the pursuit of happyness and ive only watched a random 10 minutes of it.
ready to have Kev Civ4 me to sleep. best hubby ever. ;)
I heart Antis Malbec
today I will be delivering wine, (hopefully) getting some orders and I have a tasting tonight :)
Merry Christmas! I got a plane ticket to Boston in my stocking :)
still wrapping gifts! drinking a Cannonau
Orders in! Now time to wrap gifts, bake more and have a glass of WINE! (or two)
I sold a lot more wine today than I thought I would! Good day was had by all!
